title: Dubové, Zvolen District
text:
Dubové () is a <a href="village">village</a> and <a href="municipality">municipality</a> of the <a href="Zvolen%20District">Zvolen District</a> in the <a href="Bansk%C3%A1%20Bystrica%20Region">Banská Bystrica Region</a> of <a href="Slovakia">Slovakia</a>.
History.
In <a href="history">historical records</a>, the <a href="village">village</a> was first mentioned in 1225 when <a href="King%20Bela%20IV">King Bela IV</a> donated it to a certain Pertold from <a href="Zvolen">Zvolen</a>. In 1287 it passed to a certain Termanus, <a href="knight">knight</a> Arnold's son from <a href="Bansk%C3%A1%20%C5%A0tiavnica">Banská Štiavnica</a>. After on, it belonged to <a href="Dobr%C3%A1%20Niva">Dobrá Niva</a> . Later on, it belonged to <a href="Bansk%C3%A1%20%C5%A0tiavnica">Banská Štiavnica</a>.
